column3: Concept ACK. Though reviewing a +31933-31933 diff is a bit daunting, so I'd prefer a scripted-diff.

Aww shoot, one of the travis build spuriously errored out: https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/builds/514144261\n\nI guess the validity of the change can be checked by building without this patch and with, the binary should not change a bit.
